0.post_text:
Come give our local talents some love this new year. 
Brandon Lee’s 2nd album, titled ‘Back against the World’, launches in time for the new year festivities. He will be serenading coffee-lovers over 4 Saturdays this January. 

Catch him at his second set tomorrow at Starbucks 313@Somerset, 4PM. See you there!

comments.message: this is simply great~

1.post_text:
Just as we mull over the end of Christmas and all things festive, CNY beckons right around the corner. Starbucks has a special something for everyone to welcome this lovely season of the orient. Lunar New Year Cookies, exclusively available while stocks last, presents a lovely way to gift this time of year. A carefully curated mix of east-meets-west, balance the oriental flavor of our Caramel Pineapple Tarts with the unique Coffee Pineapple Tarts, Sable Cookies, and wash it all down with your very own home-brewed Starbucks House Blend VIA® Ready Brew. 
Get yours today for $28.80. 

P.S. There’s also an additional perk for Starbucks Card customers, enjoy your privilege from now till 25th!

7.post_text: Our dear friends, Starbucks has something exciting in stores for you again. Since this is the season of new beginnings, celebrate it with a calming cup of Hojicha Latte which encapsulates the fragrance and wonders of spring in a humble coffee cup. Or find comfort in the familiar Soy Green Tea Latte that warms the soul any day. Which Tea Latte will you try first?

9.post_text: HAPPY NEW YEAR from all your friends at Starbucks. Let this be another year of warm fuzzy memories at our cafes as you get together over coffee that is nothing short of amazing.

10.post_text: Hi 2013, we’re ready for you! Guys, let’s conclude the year by sharing some joyous moments you’ve experienced with friends at Starbucks this year. If you’re looking for a cosy countdown spot, come join us for your fav handcrafted beverage at any of our 24-hour stores island-wide. Click on the link below to find your nearest location.

11.post_text: As the Christmas festivities wrap up and the new year beckons, do take the opportunity to enjoy our holiday beverages while they're still available. At the same time, check out our Christmas merchandise now going at a clearance discount. Cheers to the final weekend of 2012! :)

13.post_text:
It’s one day to Christmas, how is everybody counting down tonight?

For those who love late nights, look no further than our 24-Hour coffee houses, located across the island. Catch up with an old friend, find a quiet space to read and let your thoughts flow, or battle insomnia with a warm cuppa. Located islandwide, such as at Bugis Junction, Plaza Singapura, Liat Towers, Raffles City, Northpoint, Tampines Mall (and more!), we’ll be brewing all night so do count down to Christmas in our stores tonight.
Check out http://www.starbucks.com.sg/stores-24h.html to find your nearest 24 hour Starbucks store today. 

Happy Holidays! :)

14.post_text: Hey guys, Christmas is so close that we can almost smell it here. What better way to curl up in the warmth of the season than with your fingers wrapped ‘round a cuppa goodness. Never be without great coffee, aye? If you are still fretting over what to get your nearest and dearest, pop in to check out our lovely range of festive goodies. In the line-up are – Starbucks cards, festive log cakes, seasonal Christmas coffees, great gift ideas, stocking stuffers and more. Who on your list could use a gift of coffee? Cheers from all of us at Starbucks!

15.post_text:
Spread some cheer this Christmas. While you’re out shopping for pressies, be sure to pop by our stores.
Our exclusive charity tumblers, designed by Kevin Ou and Don Richmond, are still available for sale. Remember, $5 from each tumbler sale goes to The Salvation Army.

Come do your part for charity and gain a limited edition tumbler while doing so. What’s not to love? Find out more on Don Richmond and his inspiration here at: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Don-Richmond/8499042415?ref=ts&fref=ts

Hi guys, we apologize for any confusion caused. What we meant was this celebratory discount applies to selected Starbucks Christmas merchandise, which also includes our seasonal festive VIA coffee, the Starbucks Christmas Blend VIA Ready Brew. Enjoy the treat, and thank you for celebrating our 16th Anniversary with us! :)

Congratulations from Australia on 16 years of great service, friendly staff and of course great coffee. A BIG thanks to the guys at the Marina Square store too. And a BIGGER thank-you to you Shareen :)

17.post_text:
Hi guys, guess what. Starbucks Singapore is 16 today! *confetti*
We want everyone to celebrate this momentous day with us, so we’ve got some good stuff in store for you…
 
From now till Christmas Day (25 Dec), enjoy 15-25%* off selected Starbucks Christmas merchandise as our way of saying Thank You for all our support.
- For Starbucks Card members, be the first to enjoy this treat from 14-16 Dec (today till Sun).
- This event is open to all customers from 17-25 Dec.
* Terms & conditions apply. Details in poster attached.
 
Hope you feel as joyous as we do!
Thank You for all your support and here’s to many more years of getting together with friends over coffee. Cheers.
